botpress_service_unavailable_message_des: The Bot will send this message to Visitor if service is unavailable
botpress_handover_message_description: The Bot will send this message to Visitor upon handover
botpress_close_chat_message_description: This message will be sent automatically when a chat is closed
botpress_callback_message_description: Enabling this setting will allow the app to use only callback messages. This feature is useful when you are using Reminder messages in your botpress bot.
botpress_default_handover_department_des: Enter the target department name where you want to transfer the visitor upon handover
botpress_hide_quick_replies_description: If enabled, then all quick-replies will hide when a visitor clicks on any one of them
botpress_enable_wakeup: Send wakeup message to the bot
botpress_enable_wakeup_description: Sends a wakeup message to the bot before sending the first message of the visitor
botpress_enable_wakeup_message_descripti: Message to be send to the bot
